duties_responsibilities.duty: Serve as a subject matter expert in energy system installation, providing training and mentoring to team members.
Supervise jobsite activities, guide and train team members to ensure compliance, and resolve equipment and system issues.
Service and commission energy systems on roofs, including array layout, mounting hardware, and troubleshooting onsite.
Collaborate with warehouse team to ensure material and equipment availability onsite, and communicate job status to customers and leadership.
Drive team members to improve efficiency and productivity goals, while performing routine maintenance on energy systems.
Attend weekly team meetings, training sessions, and provide exceptional customer experience to all customers.
Perform other related duties as assigned, including travel up to 2 weeks at a time, several times a year to various US locations.

education_certification.credential: Valid Driver's License, Extensive knowledge in PV equipment, electrical wiring, and general construction or carpentry. Excellent customer service and communication skills required.
